description: OpenMcdf supports read/write operations on streams and storages and traversal of structures tree. It supports version 3 and 4 of the specifications, uses lazy loading wherever possible to reduce memory usage and offer an intuitive API to work with structured files.
summary: OpenMCDF is a 100% .net / C# component that allows developers to manipulate Microsoft Compound Document Files (also known as OLE structured storage).
author: ironfede
